section.para: To view Check Registers by Bank Account, select the "Check Register" option. The following screen will appear:

tip.para: You can void posted Checks using the right-click option on the Check Register display. When voiding a Check, you will be given the option to specify the void date. Apply-to records will also be reversed on the void date you specify.

section.para: When displaying Check Register information, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the Bank Account whose Check Register information you want to display.
Checks posted on and after this date will be displayed.
Checks posted on and before this date will be displayed.

Select to include Check detail information in the display. If selected, the Vouchers and/or Debit Memos associated with Checks will be displayed in a nested list. Be sure to use the QUERY button after selecting this option to ensure detail is included in the display.

Display lists Checks by Bank Account, using the specified parameters. This display is a nested list, with a plus ("+") sign located to the far left of the display next to each date. By clicking your mouse on a plus sign, you reveal lower levels of information related to transactions on that date. The total amount of all Checks will also be displayed.
